nodes.body:
The construction of these verbs is difficult to understand at the present time. The meaning of one of the components taken by itself is no longer comprehensible, or has been partially lost.

  • ཡི་ཆེས་ “To have faith”
  • ཧ་ལས་ “To be surprised”
  • གཉིད་ཁུག་ “To fall asleep”
  • ཧོན་ཐོར་ “To be astonished”
nodes.title: Compounds that are Difficult to Analyze without a Historical Perspective

meta.title: Compounds that are Difficult to Analyze without a Historical Perspective
